{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | 1=
bool operator!() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns {{c|true}} if an error has occurred on the associated stream. Specifically, returns {{c|true}} if {{tt|badbit}} or {{tt|failbit}} is set in {{c|rdstate()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if an error has occurred, {{c|false}} otherwise.
